title: Did Trump say that 19th - grade death would not hurt anyone as much as it would hurt himself?
subtitle: In an interview with ABC News, the President spoke of the reopening of the United States and what he would say to those who lost loved ones because of the Corona virus disease.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: When United States President Donald Trump was asked what he would say to the people who lost their family members to COVID-19, he answered, "I say this doesn't hurt anyone as much as it hurts me."
